ActCanadian Environmental Assessment Act, 2012
SubjectOrder Deciding that the Environmental Effects of the Proposed Marathon Palladium Project are Justified
PrecisOrder deciding that the significant adverse environmental effects that are likely to be caused by the MARATHON PALLADIUM PROJECT, proposed by Generation PGM Inc., are justified in the circumstances.
